Articles.Content: As many KSP 1.2.2 BDArmory users know, North Kerbin Dynamics has yet to be updated to the latest version. What I would like to know is the developer's status; currently working on the next update, leaving the mod, or simply absent in KSP. If the developer is leaving the mod, who will continue it? Thanks to anyone who replies.
Why you don't ask directly on that add-on thread? The author is around and would probably answer. Maybe even to tell you the mod is already updated. Locking this one.
